thread.title: TIDAL 1020 Charity Concert Headlines with Jay-Z, Beyonce, Prince Among Others
thread.title_full: TIDAL 1020 Charity Concert Headlines with Jay-Z, Beyonce, Prince Among Others

author: Jason Million
title: TIDAL 1020 Charity Concert Headlines with Jay-Z, Beyonce, Prince Among Others
text:
Tweet on Twitter 
TIDAL continues its trend of unforgettable shows this year this time with a Benefit Concert taking place on 10/20 aka October 20th. Headliners will include Jay-Z, Beyonce, Prince , T.I., Usher, Nicki Minaj, and a pleathora of others. You can only imagine who else will show up. The show is titled “TIDAL X: 1020 Amplified by HTC” and take place at the Barclay Center in New York City. 
If you are a TIDAL subscriber presales have actually started. If not you can either decide to sign up now or wait for the release to the general public on October 2nd. Tickets range from $39.50-$250.00 depending on selection of seats. 
What’s best of all besides the superstar lineup is all funds will go to charity. All expenses are being covered separately to ensure maximum funds being donated. All funds collected from ticket sales will be administered by New World Foundation on behalf of TIDAL. TIDAL specifically will match 100% of all net gross proceeds that will go to the TIDAL X FUND at New World Foundation during pre-sale period o 100% of ticket sales will benefit nonprofit organizations dedicated to advancing positive community relations and effecting systemic change for the development and sustainability of just societies, this inaugural event’s philanthropic focus. o All expenses are being covered separately to ensure maximum funds being donated. 
If you can’t make it to the Barclay Center, TIDAL will be livestreaming the event for non-members and subscribers for FREE. 
While watching there will be opportunities to donate to New World Foundation as well. SHARE
